practice_phrases.known: 但是
practice_phrases.target: But

practice_phrases.known: 但是现在
practice_phrases.target: But now

practice_phrases.known: 但是我想学习
practice_phrases.target: But I want to learn

practice_phrases.known: 但是我正在努力学习
practice_phrases.target: But I'm trying to learn

practice_phrases.known: 但是我想和你说英语
practice_phrases.target: But I want to speak English with you

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不确定我能不能记住
practice_phrases.target: But I'm not sure if I can remember

practice_phrases.known: 但是我想让你明天跟我说英语
practice_phrases.target: But I want you to speak English with me tomorrow

practice_phrases.known: 但是我想今天尽我所能地尝试
practice_phrases.target: But I want to try as hard as I can today

practice_phrases.known: 但是我们想今天晚上六点见面
practice_phrases.target: But we want to meet at six o'clock this evening

practice_phrases.known: 但是我要试着解释我的意思
practice_phrases.target: But I'm going to try to explain what I mean

practice_phrases.known: 我不想
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不想
practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to

practice_phrases.known: 我不想现在说
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to speak now

practice_phrases.known: 我不想和你说话
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to speak with you

practice_phrases.known: 我不想猜测明天会发生什么
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to guess what's going to happen tomorrow

practice_phrases.known: 我不想和别人练习说话
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to practise speaking with someone else

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不想让你今天晚上见面
practice_phrases.target: But I do not want you to meet this evening

practice_phrases.known: 我不想在你说完之后说话
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to speak after you finish

practice_phrases.known: 我不想让你明天跟我说英语
practice_phrases.target: I do not want you to speak English with me tomorrow

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不想猜测明天会发生什么
practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to guess what's going to happen tomorrow

practice_phrases.known: 停止
practice_phrases.target: To stop

practice_phrases.known: 我不想停止
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不想停止
practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop

practice_phrases.known: 我不想停止学习
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop learning

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不想停止尝试
practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop trying

practice_phrases.known: 我不想停止和你说英语
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop speaking English with you

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不想停止和别人练习
practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop practising with someone else

practice_phrases.known: 我不想停止试着解释我的意思
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop trying to explain what I mean

practice_phrases.known: 但是我不想停止尽我所能地尝试
practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop trying as hard as I can

practice_phrases.known: 我不想停止学习怎么说
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop learning how to say

practice_phrases.known: 说话
practice_phrases.target: To speak

practice_phrases.known: 我不想停止说话
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop speaking

practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop speaking

practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop speaking with you

practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop speaking now

practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop practising speaking with someone else

practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop speaking after you finish

practice_phrases.known: 我不想停止和你说英语
practice_phrases.target: I do not want to stop speaking English with you

practice_phrases.target: But I do not want to stop trying to speak with you
